body: As a swift action, the barbarian can cause her melee attacks to deal an additional 1d6 points of energy damage (acid, cold, electricity, or fire) for 1 round. A barbarian must be at least 4th level to select this rage power. This power can only be used once per rage.
name: Elemental Rage, Lesser
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Barbarian/Rage Powers/Elemental Rage/Lesser
